name: df-css
body: |- wceq(ccss, cmpt(s0, universe, cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cocv, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cocv, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ ClSubSp =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 | s1 =((ocv ` s0)`((ocv ` s0)` s1))})
comment: Define the set of closed (linear) subspaces of a given pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)
